ISSUE.TITLE: Docker Volume for App
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: What is the volume for persistence? I referred to the `docker-compose.yml` on the codebase, but it does not have a volume for persistence on the nocodb app. I find that each time I recreate the container, I have to see the welcome splash and setup my users again. Metadata also have to be reset each time. Someone on discord mentioned `/usr/src/app`, but I tried this and it didn't work, nor could I find this anywhere else. Any official documentation? :)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: feat: Docker tool directory Default tool directory is configured as `/usr/app/data/`, so user can mount volume and persist data(meta, uplods, default sqlite meta db, etc..) re #351 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <61551451+pranavxc@users.noreply.github.com>
